item.title: By: AOMIE
item.dc:creator: AOMIE
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://netmiko.com/install-and-setup-anaconda-ubuntu/#comment-226">Jamal</a>.
I need you to follow the tutorial once again, this time follow everything step by step. You might have missed a step.
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jamal.

I need you to follow the tutorial once again, this time follow everything step by step. You might have missed a step.

item.title: By: Jamal
item.dc:creator: Jamal
item.description: Hello there, sorry i have a problem I did what you have done in the movie ,but the problem is doesn't show the base word in new terminal and when i get conda --version ,it doesn't found it.... Would you please help me to fix it...
item.content:encoded:
Hello there, sorry i have a problem
I did what you have done in the movie ,but the problem is doesn’t show the base word in new terminal and when i get conda –version ,it doesn’t found it….
Would you please help me to fix it…
